caption:
The photograph captures an elderly man as he tends to a lush garden. The man, appearing focused and intent on his task, is kneeling beside a large patch of white flowers. He has neatly combed gray hair, a short gray beard, and is dressed in a light-colored, short-sleeved button-up shirt. His hands are gently touching the plants, suggesting he is either planting them or caring for them.

The plants are vibrant, with plentiful white blooms and healthy green foliage, indicating a well-kept garden. The background is softly out of focus, drawing attention to the man and the flowers, but hints at a natural, outdoor setting with muted earthy tones.

The composition of the image, with its rich colors and focus on the interaction between the man and the garden, evokes a sense of tranquility and the serene pleasure of gardening. The use of natural light enhances the vividness of the plant's colors and sets a gentle, calming mood.
title: Buz lee transferred his nursery business from gainesville Georgia, 32 miles north to helen, a mountain village of some 270 residents
